    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }

            <code class="fname">/home/sedward/dcrm/venvDRCM/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/datastructures.py</code>, line 86, in __getitem__
          

          
            <div class="context" id="c139809139347776">
              
                <ol start="79" class="pre-context" id="pre139809139347776">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        Return the last data value for this key, or [] if it&#x27;s an empty list;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        raise KeyError if not found.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>            list_ = super().__getitem__(key)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        except KeyError:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="86" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>            raise MultiValueDictKeyError(key)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='87' class="post-context" id="post139809139347776">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>            return list_[-1]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>        except IndexError:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>            return []</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139347776', 'post139809139347776')"><pre>    def __setitem__(self, key, value):</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>def csrf_exempt(view_func):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    def wrapped_view(*args, **kwargs):</pre></li>
                
                </ol>

              </ol>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139459520', 'post139809139459520')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121599808', 'post139809121599808')"><pre>            # If it is an asynchronous view, run it in a subthread.</pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121600320', 'post139809121600320')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121600320', 'post139809121600320')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121600320', 'post139809121600320')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121600320', 'post139809121600320')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>

                </ol>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121600320', 'post139809121600320')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>

        <li class="frame user">

            <div class="context" id="c139809121601856">
              
                <ol start="499" class="pre-context" id="pre139809121601856">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121601856', 'post139809121601856')"><pre>            # Get the appropriate handler method</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121601856', 'post139809121601856')"><pre>            if request.method.lower() in self.http_method_names:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809121601856', 'post139809121601856')"><pre>                handler = getattr(self, request.method.lower(),</pre></li>

    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre></pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>        Return the last data value for this key, or [] if it&#x27;s an empty list;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>        raise KeyError if not found.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>

                <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>            list_ = super().__getitem__(key)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809122428224', 'post139809122428224')"><pre>            return list_[-1]</pre></li>

  <div id="explanation">
    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
    </p>
  </div>

</body>
</html>

    table.vars td, table.req td { font-family:monospace; }
    table td.code { width:100%; }
    table td.code pre { overflow:hidden; }
    table.source th { color:#666; }
    table.source td { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; }
    ul.traceback { list-style-type:none; color: #222; }
    ul.traceback li.cause { word-break: break-word; }
    ul.traceback li.frame { padding-bottom:1em; color:#4f4f4f; }
    ul.traceback li.user { background-color:#e0e0e0; color:#000 }
    div.context { padding:10px 0; overflow:hidden; }
    div.context ol { padding-left:30px; margin:0 10px; list-style-position: inside; }
    div.context ol li { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; color:#777; cursor:pointer; padding-left: 2px; }
    div.context ol li pre { display:inline; }
    div.context ol.context-line li { color:#464646; background-color:#dfdfdf; padding: 3px 2px; }
    div.context ol.context-line li span { position:absolute; right:32px; }
    .user div.context ol.context-line li { background-color:#bbb; color:#000; }
    .user div.context ol li { color:#666; }
    div.commands, summary.commands { margin-left: 40px; }
    div.commands a, summary.commands { color:#555; text-decoration:none; }
    .user div.commands a { color: black; }
    #summary { background: #ffc; }
    #summary h2 { font-weight: normal; color: #666; }
    #explanation { background:#eee; }
    #template, #template-not-exist { background:#f6f6f6; }
    #template-not-exist ul { margin: 0 0 10px 20px; }
    #template-not-exist .postmortem-section { margin-bottom: 3px; }

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>
  
</head>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139451520', 'post139809139451520')"><pre>        raise KeyError if not found.</pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139451520', 'post139809139451520')"><pre>        except IndexError:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139451520', 'post139809139451520')"><pre>            return []</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809139451520', 'post139809139451520')"><pre></pre></li>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

        <li class="frame django">
          
            <code class="fname">/home/sedward/dcrm/venvDRCM/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/datastructures.py</code>, line 86, in __getitem__
          

          
            <div class="context" id="c139809158237248">
              
                <ol start="79" class="pre-context" id="pre139809158237248">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        Return the last data value for this key, or [] if it&#x27;s an empty list;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        raise KeyError if not found.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>            list_ = super().__getitem__(key)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        except KeyError:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="86" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>            raise MultiValueDictKeyError(key)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='87' class="post-context" id="post139809158237248">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>            return list_[-1]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>        except IndexError:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre>            return []</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139809158237248', 'post139809158237248')"><pre></pre></li>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    def wrapped_view(*args, **kwargs):</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="55" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>        return view_func(*args, **kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='56' class="post-context" id="post140563713322432">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713322432', 'post140563713322432')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

            <div class="context" id="c140563713349632">

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>	def post(self, request):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>		if &#x27;account&#x27; in request.POST and request.POST[&#x27;account&#x27;]:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>			data = request.POST[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>

                </ol>
              
              <ol start="116" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>			data = json.loads(request.body.decode(&quot;utf-8&quot;))[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='117' class="post-context" id="post140563713349632">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>		if data:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>			# account = data[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>			try:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>				customer_account = Account.objects.get(account_number=data)</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713349632', 'post140563713349632')"><pre>				if customer_account:</pre></li>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>        if response is None:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>            wrapped_callback = self.make_view_atomic(callback)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>            # If it is an asynchronous view, run it in a subthread.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>            if asyncio.iscoroutinefunction(wrapped_callback):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>                wrapped_callback = async_to_sync(wrapped_callback)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>            try:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="197" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>                response = wrapped_callback(request, *callback_args, **callback_kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='198' class="post-context" id="post140563712918784">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>            except Exception as e:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>                response = self.process_exception_by_middleware(e, request)</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>                if response is None:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>                    raise</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918784', 'post140563712918784')"><pre>        # Complain if the view returned None (a common error).</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>def csrf_exempt(view_func):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    def wrapped_view(*args, **kwargs):</pre></li>
                
                </ol>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563712918016', 'post140563712918016')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>

        <li class="frame user">

            <div class="context" id="c140563713350080">
              
                <ol start="499" class="pre-context" id="pre140563713350080">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>            # Get the appropriate handler method</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>            if request.method.lower() in self.http_method_names:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>                handler = getattr(self, request.method.lower(),</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>                                  self.http_method_not_allowed)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>            else:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>                handler = self.http_method_not_allowed</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="506" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>            response = handler(request, *args, **kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='507' class="post-context" id="post140563713350080">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>        except Exception as exc:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350080', 'post140563713350080')"><pre>            response = self.handle_exception(exc)</pre></li>

    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

<div id="summary">
  <h1>RawPostDataException
       at /api/accounts/loans/</h1>
  <pre class="exception_value">You cannot access body after reading from request&#x27;s data stream</pre>
  <table class="meta">

    <tr>
      <th>Request Method:</th>
      <td>POST</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <th>Request URL:</th>
      <td>http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/accounts/loans/</td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <th>Django Version:</th>
      <td>4.1.7</td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <th>Exception Type:</th>
      <td>RawPostDataException</td>
    </tr>


    <tr>
      <th>Exception Value:</th>
      <td><pre>You cannot access body after reading from request&#x27;s data stream</pre></td>
    </tr>


    <tr>
      <th>Exception Location:</th>
      <td><span class="fname">/home/sedward/dcrm/venvDRCM/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/http/request.py</span>, line 329, in body</td>
    </tr>

        <li class="frame user">
          
            <code class="fname">/home/sedward/dcrm/venvDRCM/lib/python3.8/site-packages/rest_framework/views.py</code>, line 480, in raise_uncaught_exception
          

          
            <div class="context" id="c140563713009856">
              
                <ol start="473" class="pre-context" id="pre140563713009856">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713009856', 'post140563713009856')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713009856', 'post140563713009856')"><pre>    def raise_uncaught_exception(self, exc):</pre></li>

  <div id="explanation">
    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
    </p>
  </div>

</body>
</html>

    tbody td, tbody th { vertical-align:top; padding:2px 3px; }
    thead th {
      padding:1px 6px 1px 3px; background:#fefefe; text-align:left;
      font-weight:normal; font-size:11px; border:1px solid #ddd;
    }
    tbody th { width:12em; text-align:right; color:#666; padding-right:.5em; }
    table.vars { margin:5px 10px 2px 40px; width: auto; }
    table.vars td, table.req td { font-family:monospace; }
    table td.code { width:100%; }
    table td.code pre { overflow:hidden; }
    table.source th { color:#666; }
    table.source td { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; }
    ul.traceback { list-style-type:none; color: #222; }
    ul.traceback li.cause { word-break: break-word; }
    ul.traceback li.frame { padding-bottom:1em; color:#4f4f4f; }
    ul.traceback li.user { background-color:#e0e0e0; color:#000 }
    div.context { padding:10px 0; overflow:hidden; }
    div.context ol { padding-left:30px; margin:0 10px; list-style-position: inside; }
    div.context ol li { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; color:#777; cursor:pointer; padding-left: 2px; }
    div.context ol li pre { display:inline; }
    div.context ol.context-line li { color:#464646; background-color:#dfdfdf; padding: 3px 2px; }
    div.context ol.context-line li span { position:absolute; right:32px; }
    .user div.context ol.context-line li { background-color:#bbb; color:#000; }
    .user div.context ol li { color:#666; }
    div.commands, summary.commands { margin-left: 40px; }
    div.commands a, summary.commands { color:#555; text-decoration:none; }
    .user div.commands a { color: black; }
    #summary { background: #ffc; }
    #summary h2 { font-weight: normal; color: #666; }
    #explanation { background:#eee; }
    #template, #template-not-exist { background:#f6f6f6; }
    #template-not-exist ul { margin: 0 0 10px 20px; }
    #template-not-exist .postmortem-section { margin-bottom: 3px; }
    #unicode-hint { background:#eee; }
    #traceback { background:#eee; }
    #requestinfo { background:#f6f6f6; padding-left:120px; }
    #summary table { border:none; background:transparent; }
    #requestinfo h2, #requestinfo h3 { position:relative; margin-left:-100px; }
    #requestinfo h3 { margin-bottom:-1em; }

    .append-bottom { margin-bottom: 10px; }
    .fname { user-select: all; }
  </style>
  
  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>
  
</head>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>    def wrapped_view(*args, **kwargs):</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="55" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>        return view_func(*args, **kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='56' class="post-context" id="post140563713350656">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563713350656', 'post140563713350656')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

            <div class="context" id="c140563721947264">
              
                <ol start="109" class="pre-context" id="pre140563721947264">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>				).save()</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>	def post(self, request):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>		if &#x27;account&#x27; in request.POST and request.POST[&#x27;account&#x27;]:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>			data = request.POST[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>		else:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="116" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>			data = json.loads(request.body.decode(&quot;utf-8&quot;))[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='117' class="post-context" id="post140563721947264">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>		if data:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>			# account = data[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>			try:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>				customer_account = Account.objects.get(account_number=data)</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>				if customer_account:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140563721947264', 'post140563721947264')"><pre>					account_number = customer_account.account_number</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>        if response is None:</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>            wrapped_callback = self.make_view_atomic(callback)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>            # If it is an asynchronous view, run it in a subthread.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>            if asyncio.iscoroutinefunction(wrapped_callback):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>                wrapped_callback = async_to_sync(wrapped_callback)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>            try:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="197" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>                response = wrapped_callback(request, *callback_args, **callback_kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='198' class="post-context" id="post140048370246464">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>            except Exception as e:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>                response = self.process_exception_by_middleware(e, request)</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>                if response is None:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>                    raise</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246464', 'post140048370246464')"><pre>        # Complain if the view returned None (a common error).</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048370246400', 'post140048370246400')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048379557760', 'post140048379557760')"><pre>            # Get the appropriate handler method</pre></li>

    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

<body>
<div id="summary">
  <h1>RawPostDataException
       at /api/accounts/loans/</h1>
  <pre class="exception_value">You cannot access body after reading from request&#x27;s data stream</pre>
  <table class="meta">

    <tr>
      <th>Request Method:</th>
      <td>POST</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <th>Request URL:</th>
      <td>http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/accounts/loans/</td>
    </tr>

          <td class="code"><pre>&#x27;F Y&#x27;</pre></td>
        </tr>
      
    </tbody>
  </table>

</div>

  <div id="explanation">
    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
    </p>
  </div>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>            self = cls(**initkwargs)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>            self.setup(request, *args, **kwargs)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>            if not hasattr(self, &quot;request&quot;):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>                raise AttributeError(</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>                    &quot;%s instance has no &#x27;request&#x27; attribute. Did you override &quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>                    &quot;setup() and forget to call super()?&quot; % cls.__name__</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>                )</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="103" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>            return self.dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='104' class="post-context" id="post140048369552512">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>        view.view_class = cls</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>        view.view_initkwargs = initkwargs</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>        # __name__ and __qualname__ are intentionally left unchanged as</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369552512', 'post140048369552512')"><pre>        # view_class should be used to robustly determine the name of the view</pre></li>

        <li class="frame user">
          
            <code class="fname">/home/sedward/dcrm/venvDRCM/lib/python3.8/site-packages/rest_framework/request.py</code>, line 416, in __getattr__
          

          
            <div class="context" id="c140048360253504">
              
                <ol start="409" class="pre-context" id="pre140048360253504">
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>    def __getattr__(self, attr):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        If an attribute does not exist on this instance, then we also attempt</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        to proxy it to the underlying HttpRequest object.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        &quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        try:</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="416" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>            return getattr(self._request, attr)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='417' class="post-context" id="post140048360253504">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>        except AttributeError:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360253504', 'post140048360253504')"><pre>            return self.__getattribute__(attr)</pre></li>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369576960', 'post140048369576960')"><pre>        # Complain if the view returned None (a common error).</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048369577600', 'post140048369577600')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

            <div class="context" id="c140048360376960">

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140048360376960', 'post140048360376960')"><pre>            request = self.request</pre></li>

                <ol start='481' class="post-context" id="post140048360376960">

  <div id="explanation">
    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
    </p>
  </div>

</body>
</html>

    table.vars td, table.req td { font-family:monospace; }
    table td.code { width:100%; }
    table td.code pre { overflow:hidden; }
    table.source th { color:#666; }
    table.source td { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; }
    ul.traceback { list-style-type:none; color: #222; }
    ul.traceback li.cause { word-break: break-word; }
    ul.traceback li.frame { padding-bottom:1em; color:#4f4f4f; }
    ul.traceback li.user { background-color:#e0e0e0; color:#000 }
    div.context { padding:10px 0; overflow:hidden; }
    div.context ol { padding-left:30px; margin:0 10px; list-style-position: inside; }
    div.context ol li { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; color:#777; cursor:pointer; padding-left: 2px; }
    div.context ol li pre { display:inline; }
    div.context ol.context-line li { color:#464646; background-color:#dfdfdf; padding: 3px 2px; }
    div.context ol.context-line li span { position:absolute; right:32px; }
    .user div.context ol.context-line li { background-color:#bbb; color:#000; }
    .user div.context ol li { color:#666; }
    div.commands, summary.commands { margin-left: 40px; }
    div.commands a, summary.commands { color:#555; text-decoration:none; }
    .user div.commands a { color: black; }
    #summary { background: #ffc; }
    #summary h2 { font-weight: normal; color: #666; }
    #explanation { background:#eee; }
    #template, #template-not-exist { background:#f6f6f6; }
    #template-not-exist ul { margin: 0 0 10px 20px; }
    #template-not-exist .postmortem-section { margin-bottom: 3px; }
    #unicode-hint { background:#eee; }
    #traceback { background:#eee; }
    #requestinfo { background:#f6f6f6; padding-left:120px; }
    #summary table { border:none; background:transparent; }
    #requestinfo h2, #requestinfo h3 { position:relative; margin-left:-100px; }
    #requestinfo h3 { margin-bottom:-1em; }
    .error { background: #ffc; }
    .specific { color:#cc3300; font-weight:bold; }
    h2 span.commands { font-size:.7em; font-weight:normal; }
    span.commands a:link {color:#5E5694;}
    pre.exception_value { font-family: sans-serif; color: #575757; font-size: 1.5em; margin: 10px 0 10px 0; }
    .append-bottom { margin-bottom: 10px; }
    .fname { user-select: all; }
  </style>
  
  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>
  
</head>

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831166912', 'post139723831166912')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831166912', 'post139723831166912')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831166912', 'post139723831166912')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831166912', 'post139723831166912')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>

                </ol>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831166912', 'post139723831166912')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre139723831222784', 'post139723831222784')"><pre>    # accidental removal of this exemption in cases where `dispatch` needs to</pre></li>

  <div id="explanation">
    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
    </p>
  </div>

</body>
</html>

    table td.code { width:100%; }
    table td.code pre { overflow:hidden; }
    table.source th { color:#666; }
    table.source td { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; }
    ul.traceback { list-style-type:none; color: #222; }
    ul.traceback li.cause { word-break: break-word; }
    ul.traceback li.frame { padding-bottom:1em; color:#4f4f4f; }
    ul.traceback li.user { background-color:#e0e0e0; color:#000 }
    div.context { padding:10px 0; overflow:hidden; }
    div.context ol { padding-left:30px; margin:0 10px; list-style-position: inside; }
    div.context ol li { font-family:monospace; white-space:pre; color:#777; cursor:pointer; padding-left: 2px; }
    div.context ol li pre { display:inline; }
    div.context ol.context-line li { color:#464646; background-color:#dfdfdf; padding: 3px 2px; }
    div.context ol.context-line li span { position:absolute; right:32px; }
    .user div.context ol.context-line li { background-color:#bbb; color:#000; }
    .user div.context ol li { color:#666; }
    div.commands, summary.commands { margin-left: 40px; }
    div.commands a, summary.commands { color:#555; text-decoration:none; }
    .user div.commands a { color: black; }
    #summary { background: #ffc; }
    #summary h2 { font-weight: normal; color: #666; }
    #explanation { background:#eee; }
    #template, #template-not-exist { background:#f6f6f6; }
    #template-not-exist ul { margin: 0 0 10px 20px; }
    #template-not-exist .postmortem-section { margin-bottom: 3px; }
    #unicode-hint { background:#eee; }
    #traceback { background:#eee; }
    #requestinfo { background:#f6f6f6; padding-left:120px; }
    #summary table { border:none; background:transparent; }
    #requestinfo h2, #requestinfo h3 { position:relative; margin-left:-100px; }
    #requestinfo h3 { margin-bottom:-1em; }
    .error { background: #ffc; }
    .specific { color:#cc3300; font-weight:bold; }
    h2 span.commands { font-size:.7em; font-weight:normal; }
    span.commands a:link {color:#5E5694;}
    pre.exception_value { font-family: sans-serif; color: #575757; font-size: 1.5em; margin: 10px 0 10px 0; }
    .append-bottom { margin-bottom: 10px; }
    .fname { user-select: all; }
  </style>
  
  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>
  
</head>

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

            <div class="context" id="c139723841208128">
              
                <ol start="322" class="pre-context" id="pre139723841208128">

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343427136', 'post140489343427136')"><pre>    &quot;&quot;&quot;Mark a view function as being exempt from the CSRF view protection.&quot;&quot;&quot;</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343427136', 'post140489343427136')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343427136', 'post140489343427136')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343427136', 'post140489343427136')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>			data = json_data[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>		if data:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>			# account = data[&#x27;account&#x27;]</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>			try:</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>				customer_account = Account.objects.get(account_number=data)</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343388160', 'post140489343388160')"><pre>				if customer_account:</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre></pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>    # view_func.csrf_exempt = True would also work, but decorators are nicer</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>    # if they don&#x27;t have side effects, so return a new function.</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>    def wrapped_view(*args, **kwargs):</pre></li>
                
                </ol>
              
              <ol start="55" class="context-line">
                <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>        return view_func(*args, **kwargs)</pre> <span>â€¦</span></li>
              </ol>
              
                <ol start='56' class="post-context" id="post140489342950336">
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre></pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>    wrapped_view.csrf_exempt = True</pre></li>
                  
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489342950336', 'post140489342950336')"><pre>    return wraps(view_func)(wrapped_view)</pre></li>
                  
              </ol>
              
            </div>

    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.

  <script>
    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343430080', 'post140489343430080')"><pre>            self.setup(request, *args, **kwargs)</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343430080', 'post140489343430080')"><pre>            if not hasattr(self, &quot;request&quot;):</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343430080', 'post140489343430080')"><pre>                raise AttributeError(</pre></li>
                
                  <li onclick="toggle('pre140489343430080', 'post140489343430080')"><pre>                    &quot;%s instance has no &#x27;request&#x27; attribute. Did you override &quot;</pre></li>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your

    function hideAll(elems) {
      for (var e = 0; e < elems.length; e++) {
        elems[e].style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
    window.onload = function() {
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.pre-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('ol.post-context'));
      hideAll(document.querySelectorAll('div.pastebin'));
    }
    function toggle() {
      for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
        var e = document.getElementById(arguments[i]);
        if (e) {
          e.style.display = e.style.display == 'none' ? 'block': 'none';
        }
      }
      return false;
    }
    function switchPastebinFriendly(link) {
      s1 = "Switch to copy-and-paste view";
      s2 = "Switch back to interactive view";
      link.textContent = link.textContent.trim() == s1 ? s2: s1;
      toggle('browserTraceback', 'pastebinTraceback');
      return false;
    }
  </script>

    <p>
      Youâ€™re seeing this error because you have <code>DEBUG = True</code> in your
      Django settings file. Change that to <code>False</code>, and Django will
      display a standard page generated by the handler for this status code.
